'Peter Dennis Mitchell', FRS (29 September 1920 â€“ 10
April 1992) {{cite web |url=http://www-biology.ucsd.edu/~msaier/transport/petermitchell/MitchellFrame-
1.html |title=Peter Mitchell and the Vital Force |author=Milton H. Saier Jr |accessdate=2007-03-
23 }} was a British biochemist who was awarded the 1978 Nobel Prize for
Chemistry for his discovery of the chemiosmotic mechanism of ATP
synthesis.

Mitchell was born in Mitcham, Surrey, England. {{cite web
|url=http://www.nndb.com/people/607/000100307/ |title=Peter Mitchell Bio at NNDB
|accessdate=2007-03-23 |author=NNDB }}
